articles.title: Dow futures fall 600 points after Iran is targeted: Live updates
articles.description: The major averages posted modest gains on Thursday, placing them on track for a winning week. Softer-than-anticipated inflation reports helped lift stocks.
articles.content:
Traders work on the floor at the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York City, U.S., June 11, 2025.
U.S. stock futures fell early Friday after Israel launched an airstrike attack on Iran.

articles.title: ABC Radio Sydney presenter James Valentine announces omentum cancer diagnosis
articles.description: Valentine, who received treatment for oesophageal cancer last year, will take a leave of absence to treat the newly confirmed tumours in his omentum.
articles.content:
I'd really hoped I'd never have to do this again. I've now twice gone on the radio on 702 ABC Sydney, and published articles online, revealing details of my disease.
In March 2024, I announced that I had oesophageal cancer, and I was heading off for ... [4294 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Discover Early Forerunner of T. rex in Mongolia
articles.description: According to Reuters, Khankhuuluu mongoliensis, which lived approximately 86 million years ago during the Cretaceous Period, predates T. rex by roughly 20 million years.
articles.content: A newly discovered mid-sized dinosaur from Mongolia is shedding new light on the evolutionary origins of the fearsome Tyrannosaurus rex. The species, named Khankhuuluu mongoliensis — meaning “Dragon Prince” in Mongolian — has been identified as a cru... [3555 chars]

articles.title: The onerous cost of Crohn’s disease: ‘It becomes a choice between paying for a utility bill or medication’
articles.description: Patients spend an average of €3,252 annually on managing their condition, a report has found
articles.content:
People react in different ways to grief, but the day after the death of a close family member, Amy Dennis developed stomach cramps and diarrhoea.

articles.title: Smooth Company bids for success with Dutch launch
articles.description: Áine Kennedy’s haircare company becomes first Irish beauty brand to launch at Netherlands’ department store chain
articles.content:

articles.title: My unexpected Pride icon: Link from the Zelda games, a non-binary hero who helped me work out who I was
articles.description: Video games are the closest you can get to trying a new body for a bit, and when I played as the androgynous Link, I felt subversive and empowered
articles.content: Growing up steeped in the aggressive gender stereotypes of the 1990s was a real trip for most queer millennials, but I think gamers had it especially hard. Almost all video game characters were hypermasculine military men, unrealistically curvaceous ... [3348 chars]

articles.title: Jail for man who conned nearly S$80,000 from victims in fake massage chair investment scheme
articles.description: Mohammad Shahrizan Johari was desperate for money to pay off gambling debts and loans.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: A man leveraged his knowledge of the massage chair industry to cheat victims into investing nearly S$80,000 (US$62,000) in a fake business opportunity.
Mohammad Shahrizan Johari even perpetrated the scheme on his own cousin, who was duped ... [3948 chars]
